column1: #text=I planted a tree for Arbor Day last year .
#text=The first thing I did was decide where I want to plant my tree and I chose a nice spot in my backyard .
#text=Then I decided what kind of tree I wanted .

#text=I thought a shady tree would be nice in that spot , so I went to a tree place called a nursery and picked out a nice young tree called a sapling and I loaded into the back of my truck to take home .
#text=Once I was at home again , I got my shovel and dug a hole in the right spot in the backyard .
#text=Then I unwrapped the trees roots and very , very carefully place the tree into the hole .
#text=The roots at the bottom are called a root ball and is made of the roots and dirt that protects the roots .
#text=I was very careful not to knock the dirt off so the roots would n't be damaged .
#text=Once the root ball was settled into the hole and the tree was standing up straight , I filled the hole up with dirt again and then watered the tree .
#text=My tree is healthy and growing because I was careful with it .
